main.java

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.Board
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoardInterface, MasterInterface, RulesInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AI, BoardGrid, GameBoard

    public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements BoardInterface, RulesInterface, MasterInterface
    Is used to keep track of the positioning of players as well as check whether a new configuration of the board (a player move or a wall placement) is an illegal move.
    Author:
    Matthew Coupal

      • isOutOfBounds

        public boolean isOutOfBounds(Space potentialPosition)
        Checks to see whether the space being moved to is outside the scope/range of the board.
        Specified by:
        isOutOfBounds in interface RulesInterface
        Parameters:
        potentialPosition - The position the player wants to move to.
        Returns:
        true if the space is out of bounds (one of the coordinates is less than 0 or greater than the size of the board in the x or y direction), and is false otherwise.

        Specified by:
        isMoveLegalDiagonal in interface RulesInterface
        Parameters:

        potentialPosition - The position the player wants to move to.
        Returns:

                 int mode)

        Specified by:
        isWallHere in interface RulesInterface
        Parameters:

        startingSpace2 - A space on the opposite of the wall-half being tested
        mode - 1 if placing wall, 0 if making move
        Returns:
